body_content.explanation: If someone or something is lamented, people feel sad that they have or it has gone:
examples: No man was ever more respected or more lamented than he was.
It was a reference to the lamented TV serial "Deadwood".

body_content.explanation: used for referring to someone who has died or to something that no longer exists :
examples: The late lamented Lee Marvin once said "acting is nothing; it's not like a job or anything".
Enthusiasts of the late lamented supersonic aircraft emphasize its world-beating cruising speed of 1,350 mph.
